name: Hell's Kitchen (MaDness1184)
description:
Update:

- 10/5/2022: Fixed multiple bugs that prevent the interaction system from working as intended

Description:

The denizens of hell hunger evermore... 

As a slave of Satan you are appointed kitchen duty at Hell's most prestigious restaurant. You were put there for a reason, don't disappoint or you may become the next meal. Muhahahaha!

Controls:

W:  Move Up

A: Move Left

S: Move Down

D: Move Right

Space: Interact

Gameplay:

Every 10 Seconds a new demon will enter, you have 60 seconds to serve the demon or you will lose a star. Once your stars reach zero you lose. 

>  The side bar shows your food tickets and recipes

>  Pickup ingredients using [Interact]

>  Gather all ingredients for a certain dish at their correct station and press [interact] again to cook

>  Pick up an empty plate from the cabinet

>  Grab the cooked food with an empty plate to serve

>Clean up after your guests

>  Put any burnt and unwanted food/ingredients in the trash

Credits/Creators:

Khoa Nguyen

Ryan Carpenter

Aaron Huggins

Richard Holmes
